name: Link-a-Mup
description:
It started as a prototype to see how the mechanics of World of Goo could be reproduced in GDevelop, and it was so much trouble that I thought I should make a somewhat proper release. Then it took me ten times that trouble to reach a working prototype...

So you've got Mups, and they've got friends to save. To help them, link'em up and push those pesky buttons!

Play with mouse or finger.

There are twelve levels and three levels of difficulty.

Please share feedback and report bugs, issues, nuisance... :)
